text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Dunkirk, New York |nickname = |settlement_type = City |total_type = |motto = |other_name = |image_skyline = Dunkirk New York aerial view.jpg |imagesize = 250px |image_caption = Aerial view of Dunkirk, facing north over Lake Erie |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_caption = |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = New York#USA |pushpin_label = Dunkirk |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption = Location of Dunkirk in New York |pushpin_mapsize = |coordinates = |coordinates_footnotes = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = New York |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Chautauqua |government_footnotes = |government_type = Mayor-Council |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = 1880 (officially incorporated) |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 11.83 |area_land_km2 = 11.77 |area_water_km2 = 0.06 |area_total_sq_mi = 4.57 |area_land_sq_mi = 4.54 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.02 |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 188 |elevation_ft = 617 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 12743 |population_est = |pop_est_as_of = |population_density_km2 = 1082.59 |population_density_sq_mi = 2803.74 |timezone1 = |utc_offset1 = |timezone1_DST = |utc_offset1_DST = |postal_code_type = ZIP Code |postal_code = 14048 |area_code = 716 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 36-013-21105 |website = https://cityofdunkirk.com |footnotes = |pop_est_footnotes = }} Dunkirk is a city in Chautauqua County, New York, United States. It was founded in 1880. 12,743 people lived here at the 2020 census. Dunkirk is bordered on the north by Lake Erie. It shares a border with the village of Fredonia to the south, and with the town of Dunkirk to the east and west. Dunkirk is the westernmost city in the state of New York. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Cities in New York (state) Category:1880s establishments in New York (state) Category:1880 establishments in the United States
